entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:48 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 5:48 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 5:48 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 5:48 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
